title: Requires the provision of guides containing best practices for retaining employees who are informal caregivers
summary: Requires the provision of guides containing best practices for retaining employees who are informal caregivers; such guide shall be available on the websites of the state office for the aging, the department of labor and the department of state.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to the provision of guides containing best practices for retaining employees who are informal caregivers
